            Bio
            I enjoy some of the old and I enjoy the new. And if I can find a balance between it, that’s where I find my satisfaction
            
            
            Education
            Lund University | Lund, Sweden
            Exchange Semester | January 2021 - June 2021
            Stellenbosch University | Stellenbosch, South Africa
            MComm in Economics | January 2020 - December 2021
            The University of Cape Town | Cape Town, South Africa
            Honours in Economics | February 2018 - November 2018
            The University of Cape Town | Cape Town, South Africa
            BSocSci in Economics and Economic History | February 2015 - November 2017
            
            
            Experience
            Laboratory for the Economics of Africa’s Past | Researcher | January 2020 - Present
            FTI Consulting | Junior Economist in Economic and Financial Consulting Practice | March 2019 - January 2020
